messages.message:
Hi Team,
In the current codebase, we have a lot of instances of
```from instabase.config_utils import config as cur_config

# at the top of the file
app_config = cur_config.get_config()```
get_config creates one copy of the config object with 100+ env vars. Adding this to each file leads to multiple copies of the config object leading to increased start-up time, increase memory usage and general bloat.
I have replaced this with a single global config object. You can simply import it as
```from instabase.config_utils.config import config as app_config```
I have replaced 21 instances of this pattern in https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69395/files
There are another 190 instances of this remaining. If you hit an errors due to this let me know.
